org.sdsu.intelligrid.util

Class Vector2f

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sdsu.intelligrid.util.Vector2f

  • public class Vector2f
extends java.lang.Object
    2d vector class, useful for calculations and declarations involving vectors.

        Adds two vectors.

        left - the left-hand side of the equation
        right - the right-hand side of the equation
        dst - the destination vector; may be null
        Returns:

        right - the right-hand side of the equation

      • normalise

        public Vector2f normalise(Vector2f dst)
        Normalises the vector and places the result in dst. The local vector is not modified.
        Parameters:
        dst - the destination vector; may be null
        Returns:
        the result of normalization

      • length

        public float length()
        Calculates the actual length of the vector.
        Returns:
        the length of the vector

      • lengthSquared

        public float lengthSquared()
        Calculates the squared length of the vector. Less expensive than length().
        Returns:
        the square of the length of the vector

      • negate

        public Vector2f negate()
        Negates the vector.
        Returns:
        the local vector

      • negate

        public Vector2f negate(Vector2f dst)
        Negates the vector. The local vector is not modified.
        Parameters:
        dst - the destination vector; may be null
        Returns:
        the negation of the vector

      • angle

        public static float angle(Vector2f a,
          Vector2f b)
        Calculates the angle between two vectors, in radians.
        Returns:
        the angle of b relative to a, in radians.

      • dot

        public static float dot(Vector2f left,
        Vector2f right)
        Calculates the dot product of two vectors.
        Parameters:
        left - the left-hand side of the equation
        right - the right-hand side of the equation
        Returns:
        the dot product: left.x * right.x + left.y * right.y
